Time-profile plot wrapper

Source: R/fns_gg.R
ggtpp.Rd

Create plots for time profile data such as PK and PD plots.

Usage

ggtpp(
  d,
  x,
  y,
  id,
  ...,
  nsub = TRUE,
  logx = FALSE,
  logy = FALSE,
  alpha_point = 0.2,
  alpha_line = 0.1,
  xlab = NULL,
  ylab = NULL,
  ttl = NULL,
  sttl = NULL,
  cap = NULL
)

Arguments

d

<dfr> A data frame.

x, y

<var> Column for x- and y-axis.

id

<var> Column for grouping ID such as subject ID.

...

Other arguments to pass to ggplot2::aes for additional mapping.

nsub

<lgl> TRUE to show number of subjects in caption.

logx, logy

<lgl> TRUE to log x- and y-axis.

alpha_point

<num> Alpha value for ggplot2::geom_point.

alpha_line

<num> Alpha value for ggplot2::geom_line.

xlab, ylab

<chr> Labels for x- and y-axis.

ttl, sttl, cap

<chr> Title. Subtitle. Caption.

Value

A ggplot object.

Examples

Theoph |> ggtpp(x=Time,y=conc,id=Subject)
